explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a deep graph neural network-based model (GNN-MS) for option pricing, which falls under the umbrella of machine learning.
explanations.neural network: The paper introduces a graph neural network-based model (GNN-MS) to capture dynamic effects in option pricing.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed GNN-MS model is a deep learning approach, as it involves neural networks with multiple layers to model complex relationships.
explanations.graph neural network: The paper specifically uses a graph neural network (GNN) to model the momentum spillover effects in option pricing.
